SENIORS IN HSITORY.question: Casanova
SENIORS IN HSITORY.answer: This lusty Venetian libertine spent his last years as a librarian in Bohemia--maybe he was tired

SENIORS IN HSITORY.question: Tomas de Torquemada
SENIORS IN HSITORY.answer: He was in his 70s when Pope Alexander VI appointed 4 assistant inquisitors to restrain him

SENIORS IN HSITORY.question: Earl Mountbatten
SENIORS IN HSITORY.answer: He was 79 when his boat was blown up near Country Sligo in 1979
